nodes.text: The Nedgarr Bandits Hideout was a bunker on the Core World of Corellia used by the criminal organization known as the Nedgarr Bandits during the time of the Galactic Civil War. It was located in the Riverlands, in a relatively short distance northeast of Coronet City. Sometime following the Battle of Yavin in 0 BBY, the bandits had been responsible for damaging local farms, such as Pol Handerin's farm, and stealing grain. Circa 1 ABY, Lieutenant Mack Jasper of the Corellian Security Force tasked a spacer with disrupting their operations. The CorSec agent assaulted the Nedgarr Bandits Hideout and recovered the stolen grain. Within the lower level of the bunker, the spacer alo killed Trae Nedgarr, leader of the bandits.
The Nedgarr Bandits hideout was a location in the 2003 massively multiplayer online role-playing game Star Wars Galaxies, prior to the game's closure on December 15, 2011.
